alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 1:07PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong Westerly Winds This Afternoon... Strong westerly winds are expected this afternoon into early evening over and near the higher terrain. This will include locations across the Upper and Middle Arkansas River Valley, as well as for areas along and to the west of the I-25 corridor. Strongest wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph are expected, with possible isolated and brief gusts to 60 mph. If you are traveling across these areas, use caution and be prepared for sudden wind gusts, especially across north to south oriented roads.
